articles.author: Jessica Riga
articles.title: Donald Trump gives strongest indication he'll run for president in 2024 as Mike Pence takes aim - ABC News
articles.description: Speaking in Washington for the first time since leaving office, former US president Donald Trump strongly hints he'll run in 2024, as Mike Pence urges Americans to look ahead rather than back.
articles.content: Donald Trump has given his strongest indication yet that he will run for US president again in 2024, while vigorously repeating his false election claims that sparked the January 6 Capitol insurrecti… [+4294 chars]

articles.author: Janelle Miles
articles.title: Former American billionaire Chuck Feeney honoured by University of Queensland for multi-million-dollar donations - ABC News
articles.description: In a rare move, the "eccentric" former billionaire who prefers flying economy, and has generously donated more than $500 million to Australian causes, accepts an accolade in Queensland.

articles.title: B.J. Novak Went to Texas Looking for ‘Vengeance’ and Found America - The New York Times
articles.description: The first film from a former star of “The Office” is a dark comedy about life in a nation that’s not as divided as we might think.
articles.content:
